title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Education
body: Education         Local children enjoy a day in the park! Salem Summer Playground Program    Welcome teachers! Email with questions and to make a reservation.    Field Trips Education programs and group tours are free but require advance reservations.  Curriculum Materials Prepare students for a visit with a pre-visit activity. Teacher Workshops  Park for Every Classroom is a free summer teacher professional development program for K-12 educators of all disciplines.
